name: Hearts (itch)
description:
a small puzzle game made a while ago for the GM48 gamejam

came in 9th place thought I might aswell reupload it here :)

music by Juju

  • Controls are either WASD or (up, left, down, right).
  • Blocks can start moving in any direction :
  • Sacrifice hearts every time you move - if you run out of hearts you die :
